post.descrizione: One of the singularities of the walls is given by the sketches, recently brought to light following a restoration. Drawn on the wall, with thin lines, decorative elements appear with Ionic pilasters on the sides of the doors surmounted by a cornice with figures that seem to allude to virtue. It could not be a question of preparatory sinopias traced on the arriccio, but of a renewal that attempts to resume motifs present in the villa. The figures, of uncertain interpretation, are still subject to studies by art historians to reveal the mystery of their origin and meaning.
